title: Breakfast Potatoes
instructions: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Add diced potatoes and cook for about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add diced onion and bell pepper to the skillet. Cook for another 10-15 minutes until potatoes are golden brown and tender.
Season with paprika, garlic powder, salt, and pepper. Stir well to combine.
Garnish with fresh parsley if desired and serve hot.
